name: Akdeniz
description:
"Akdeniz" is a cooperative, beat'em UP / Adventure, procedural game in 3rd person. The Great Emperor Nilus controls the entire Mediterranean Sea and surrounding regions from the city Alexandrina, Egypt. Controlling the whole territory with a dictatorial regime subjecting the people to slavery and letting them starve. All areas that Nilus controls are managed by 6 generals, whose headquarters of power are in the wonders of the World Old. The secret Akdeniz group tries to resist, but their thirst is destroyed and all the members succumb to the example of four young apprentices. Kanon the leader of the Akdeniz, seconds before dying tells the group that they are the last hope of the people suppressed and who must overthrow the government by defeating all the generals situated in the 7 wonders of the world. The game has as a target audience the cooperative multiplayer lovers, ages from child to adult.

Developed under the course of Digital Games and Multimedia (IPL-ESTG, Portugal). By:
Diogo Reis
João Casteleiro
João Crisóstomo
Ricardo Gonçalves
